title: Crime Alert 06.06.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 06.06.19
description:
Police trick old man to solve a cold case. Police looking for masked men who killed man in a robbery. Catholic teacher resigns after being arrested in an altercation as a strip club during a school field trip.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
